title: Thursday Post Show (10-14-21)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (10-14-21)
description:
Bobby congratulates the guys on winning best podcast in Nashville for The Sore Losers. Raymundo wants to ask a favor from Bobby and Amy this weekend. He wants to drive by their houses with a bachelor party and say “hi”. We also play a round of the board game “Blank Slate”.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
